text: Kloštar Podravski is a settlement and a municipality in the Koprivnica- Križevci County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there are 3,306 inhabitants in the area. ==History== In the late 19th century and early 20th century, Kloštar Podravski was part of the Bjelovar-Križevci County of the Kingdom of Croatia-Slavonia. ==References== Category:Municipalities of Croatia Category:Populated places in Koprivnica-Križevci County
title: Kloštar Podravski
